content: Past the Celestial Pill, there will be a large pillar decoration, with a passage on the other side leading down to an open cave below the temple.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Crouching_Tiger_Temple_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Crouching Tiger Temple Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Temple Cellar'.
The content is as follows:
Past the Celestial Pill, there will be a large pillar decoration, with a passage on the other side leading down to an open cave below the temple.
